@usedefaults

{{aystemplate ayspath:$$ayspath aysname:$$aysname}}

@@title ${template_name}

h3. Service Template Info:

{% if error is defined %}
    Error: ${error}
{% else %}
    h4. Name: $$aysname
    {% for key, value in data.items() -%}
        |${key}|${value}|
    {% endfor %}

    {% for key, value in code_bloks.items() -%}
    h5. ${key} :
    {{code:
    ${value}
    }}
    {% endfor %}

    h3. Instances of this template:
    || Instance ||
    {% for repo, services in instances.items() -%}
        {% for instance in services.values() -%}
            | [${instance['instance']}|cockpit/Instance?shortkey=${instance['key']}&ayspath=${repo}]|
        {% endfor %}
    {% else %}
    No instance for this template
    {% endfor %}
{% endif %}
